resources.string: How would you rate your overall well-being right now?
What else could you have done in the time you spent on social media today? (Optional)
"Epiphany needs to work in the background as well as access to your phone usage data to track social media use. Please enable it to proceed."
Epiphany is monitoring your social media use.
